scenario.title: Corporate Data Breach: Samba Server Infiltration
scenario.description: TechCorp's file server has been configured with weak Samba settings by an inexperienced system administrator. As a penetration tester, you must identify and exploit these misconfigurations to access sensitive corporate data, simulating how real attackers could compromise enterprise file shares.
stages: Network discovery and SMB service enumeration
Identify misconfigured Samba shares and weak access controls
Exploit null sessions or weak authentication mechanisms
Navigate through accessible shares to locate sensitive data
Extract the corporate flag from the restricted administrative share
